BindException().Description: Construct a new BindException with no detailed message.

BindException(java.lang.String).Description: Constructs a new BindException with the specified detail message as to why the bind error occurred. A detail message is a String that gives a specific description of this error.

ClassDesc: Signals that an error occurred while attempting to bind a socket to a local address and port. Typically, the port is in use, or the requested local address could not be assigned.
